Support our development! \n\n You can support the upstream project of uoYabause by making a donation directly on their website http://yabause.org. You can also support this project uoYabause by clicking the donate button below, this will help towards development of more accurate emulation, input devices and a wider range of devices. This screen and advertisement screen will not be shown, If you have donated.
